galpy.orbit.Orbit.vR¶

Orbit.vR(*args, **kwargs)¶

NAME:

vR

PURPOSE:

return radial velocity at time t

INPUT:

t - (optional) time at which to get the radial velocity

OUTPUT:

vR(t)

HISTORY:

2010-09-21 - Written - Bovy (NYU)
